meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001.3 ::date 2015-11-25T02:41:56 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt What Fox News/Republicans don't seem to understand is that the bigger a movement gets, the more trouble-makers it is going to attract. # ::save-date Thu Oct 19, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001_3.txt
sentence: What Fox News/Republicans don't seem to understand is that the bigger a movement gets, the more trouble-makers it is going to attract.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001.4 ::date 2015-11-25T02:51:16 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt In other words, the trouble-makers at the OWS protests do not represent the movement itself. # ::save-date Fri Oct 13, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001_4.txt
sentence: In other words, the trouble-makers at the OWS protests do not represent the movement itself.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001.5 ::date 2015-11-25T04:53:51 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The OWS from the very beginning had a message of peaceful protesting. # ::save-date Mon Feb 8, 2016 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001_5.txt
sentence: The OWS from the very beginning had a message of peaceful protesting.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001.6 ::date 2015-11-25T05:12:41 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt That is what the founders of the movement intended. # ::save-date Wed Nov 25, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001_6.txt
sentence: That is what the founders of the movement intended.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001.7 ::date 2015-11-25T05:14:56 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Unfortunately, because the movement is leaderless and has become so wide-spread, some of them have gotten chaotic. # ::save-date Tue Dec 1, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001_7.txt
sentence: Unfortunately, because the movement is leaderless and has become so wide-spread, some of them have gotten chaotic.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001.8 ::date 2015-11-25T05:21:40 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt That is a human-driven consequence; it is not because of the ideology. # ::save-date Thu Nov 2, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001_8.txt
sentence: That is a human-driven consequence; it is not because of the ideology.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001.9 ::date 2015-11-25T05:46:37 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt I think it is reasonable to criticize the OWS movement as lacking clear goals and leadership. # ::save-date Sun Feb 7, 2016 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001_9.txt
sentence: I think it is reasonable to criticize the OWS movement as lacking clear goals and leadership.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001.10 ::date 2015-11-25T05:52:55 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt If it did have these qualities, I think more people would take their message more seriously. # ::save-date Wed Nov 25, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001_10.txt
sentence: If it did have these qualities, I think more people would take their message more seriously.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001.11 ::date 2015-11-25T06:22:43 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt However, by that same rationale, it is unfair to criticize the movement itself for a few of the trouble-makers. # ::save-date Thu Dec 7, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001_11.txt
sentence: However, by that same rationale, it is unfair to criticize the movement itself for a few of the trouble-makers.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001.12 ::date 2015-11-25T06:33:07 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Let me put it this way: if the Tea Party had become as popular movement as the OWS has (not even close), would the movement have attracted the same kind of law-breakers we see at these OWS protests? # ::save-date Thu Sep 14, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001_12.txt
sentence: Let me put it this way: if the Tea Party had become as popular movement as the OWS has (not even close), would the movement have attracted the same kind of law-breakers we see at these OWS protests?

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001.13 ::date 2015-11-25T07:09:31 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The answer is absolutely. # ::save-date Tue Dec 1, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8891686_0001_13.txt
